name: Fish's Tumblr Dash Tweaks
description:
I made this thing years ago after tumblr removed blockquotes, and never really thought to post it. But a friend wanted it, so I figured I should make it available to everyone.

Quick summary of what this does:
- Indicates new additions to posts and grays out inactive blogs.
- Rearranges posts to be more condensed.
- Hides ads and suggestions

I personally use this alongside a pretty basic XKit setup, but it seems to work the same with or without XKit.

user.about:
[UPDATE: Due to Stylish's frequent server issues, I am in the process of moving my userstyles to GreasyFork. I will not be returning to Stylish until the site issues are fixed.]

I'm a web developer with some visual/attention issues, so I end up coding little styles to get rid of things that make my life harder. Some of them have the side effect of being fun and aesthetically pleasing, too.

I try to make my code easy to read for both people and machines, so you can edit my styles to suit your needs. If you need help with something, or if one of my styles broke, you can ask me about it on my tumblr.

Also note: I don't frequent this site; I only post things here as a place to keep them, so I'll probably end up adding things that have been done before. Sorry about that.
